history.proof: intros T f v t H. srun best use: existI unfold: Formula, existH, SysPrf, System, Term.

ctx: intros T f v t H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable t.

ctx: intros T f v t H.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : System f : Formula v : nat t : Term H : SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT f v t) Unable to unify "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas ?M1456) (_ : Prf ?M1456 Axm (fol.iffH ?M1456 (substituteFormula ?M1456 ?M1457 ?M1459 ?M1460) ?M1457)), forall g : fol.Formula ?M1456, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula ?M1456) ?M1458 g" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNT) (_ : Prf LNT Axm (existH v f)), forall g : fol.Formula LNT, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) T g".

original: intros T f v t H. apply existI. apply subProp.subFormulaNil. intros x Hx. apply subProp.freeVarSubFormula4 in Hx. - auto. - intros H'. apply Hx. apply subProp.freeVarSubFormula2. apply H'. apply H.
